# convert

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of convert is to transfer xpt files to sas files in your working directory.

## Installation

You can install the development version of convert from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("zackandkatie/convert")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(convert)
#' xpt_folder <- 'XX:/convert/xpt_test'
#' convert_xpt_sas(xpt_folder)
## basic example code
```
